name: Feed The Monster (JoeMeering)
description:
Made for TRIJAM 173 - Game Jam. Meant to be in 3h but made in around 12h.

You are the Monster in your swamp and can use A-D or arrow keys to go right and left. You left click the mouse the explode bombs to try and get the little Monsters to fall into your swamp so you can try and eat them.

Top score: 19

All assets used were free for everyone to use:

Characters: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/100-fantasy-characters-mega-...

Music https://freesound.org/people/esistnichtsoernst/sounds/404353/#comments

Eating SFX: https://freesound.org/people/Roland%20Katarn/sounds/180158/

Explosion: https://freesound.org/people/derplayer/sounds/587195/#comments

Font: https://www.1001freefonts.com/iron-sans.font
